summary: "XXX," a 2002 action game for Game Boy Advance, is based on the movie. You play as Xander "xXx" Cage, a thrill-seeker turned spy, fighting the bad Anarchy 99 group. Most of the game is side-scrolling action, but some levels let you ride motorcycles like in the game Road Rash. Made in just two months, it got mixed reviews. Critics didn't love the simple gameplay and short length, but they liked the cool graphics and music, especially in the motorcycle parts.
title: XXX (video game)
